title: Boris's Brexit deal is a 'fresh start' after years of 'division and doubt' says Cabinet minister Robert Jenrick
text:
Boris Johnson's Brexit deal will be a "fresh start" for the UK and a chance to "turn a page on three and a half years of division and doubt", Cabinet minister Robert Jenrick has said.

The Housing secretary also told today's Chopper's Brexit Podcast - which you can listen to on the player above - that he felt "there are some people who've been driven mad by Brexit - people on both sides of the debate".

Speaking to the podcast in the Red Lion pub on Whitehall as details of Mr Johnson's deal were first being announced, he said: "That's fantastic news.
